content:
Try something new for your next urban retreat! Pick two special offers when you book 10 or more peak room nights

 
• 50% our Refreshed Event Spaces
• Complimentary welcome reception for up to 25 guests in our redesigned bar
• Complimentary Meeting Amenities including:     Wi-Fi, New 75 flat panel TV for projection, and Flip Chart
• 2 Suite upgrades in our new studio suites  
**Book any of our hot dates & Enjoy all 4 perks Hot Dates: 11/15-11/30, 12/13-12/30
 
 BOOK BY December 1st AND ACTUALIZE BY December 31st
Based on actualized room revenue before taxes/fees.
OFFER Not Valid on EXISTING CONTRACTS, Blackout dates may apply
  B

P: 415.989.3500

E: sales@stanfordcourt.com
